Description: Fragment of lower wall of pottery krater. Inside reserved; outside, broad maeander band, above animal frieze, part of goat to right preserved.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Antikenmuseum, Heidelberg. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: CVA Heidelberg III / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Deutschland Heidelberg, Universität Band 3 (p.108 pl. 136.13)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1129)
